Name: Phantom: Chop Chop
Desc: A Tacet Discord often seen hovering atop large structures, feigning an imposing posture as if the buildings are extensions of its body. Its silhouette blends with the architecture, towering like a menacing giant.
DescOpen:
This enemy has a <color=HighlightB>higher RES</color> to <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.
 
A Tacet Discord constantly in search of a suitable "body."

Rumor has it that after the knights vanquished the evil giant, its Reverberations split into wandering Chop Chops, aimlessly seeking to reclaim their once-magnificent form.

This Tacet Discord is often seen hovering atop large structures, feigning an imposing posture as if the buildings are extensions of its body. Its silhouette blends with the architecture, towering like a menacing giant.
